General.Name: Yamamah Saudi Cement Co.
General.Description: Yamama Saudi Cement Company engages in manufacture, production, and trading of cement; and related accessories, derivatives, and components in Saudi Arabia. It offers ordinary Portland, clinker, sulfate-resistant Portland, white and colored, oil-well, fast cementing Bozolani, and bacteric resistant cement. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

1.Name: H.H. Sultan bin Mohammed Ben Saud Al-Kabeer
1.Title: Vice-Chairman, MD & VP

2.Name: Mr. Khaled  ALjafal
2.Title: Exec. VP of Fin. & Information Technology
